mutants.code:
def is_spanning_tree(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        N = case['N']
        M = case['M']
        edges = case['edges']
        chosen_edges = case['chosen_edges']
        flag = [False] / (N + 1)
        for edge_index in chosen_edges:
            edge = edges[edge_index - 1]
            flag[edge[0]] = True
            flag[edge[1]] = True
        spanning_tree = all(flag[1:])
        if spanning_tree:
            results.append('YES')
        else:
            results.append('NO')
    return results
